title: How to get money by all music platforms from royalty - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends whether you have a label, a distributor, what country you are based in, what platforms your work is available on, how you released it, etc etc. It seems you are not aware of how any of this works from the question, so please read this very handy summary someone made on their blog: Music Royalties 101: What They Are and How to Collect
